name: Over & Over
content: Damn
I thought that
I could finally love and lie
But here I am  wrong again
Over and Over
Damn
You're a thousand dreams
And a thousand words unsaid
But here I go  Wrong again
Over and Over
Just a little kiss and then goodbye
Just a little tear but I won't cry
You`re a mistake that I make
Over & Over

Just a little tear but I won't cry
You`re a mistake that I make
Over & Over
I always seem to be left wondering why
There doesn't seem to be
Any good left in goodbye
You say goodbye bittersweet
Over and Over

Just a little tear but I won't cry
You`re a mistake that I make

You`re a mistake that I make
Over & Over
